motions.title: Amendment to Add Council Comments Period
motions.description: Motion to amend agenda to add additional period of public comment for Council to comment.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of October 24, 2022, City Council Meeting Minutes • Approval of Establishing a Sinking Fund Reserve for Artificial Turf Fields • Approval of CARES 2 Budget Amendment

motions.title: Table Legislative Agenda
motions.description: Motion to table approval of proposed legislative agenda pending additions requested by Mayor.

motions.title: Project Agreement with PCID for Ashford Dunwoody Path Phase 1
motions.description: Approval of project agreement with Perimeter Community Improvement District for Ashford Dunwoody Path Phase 1 construction with PCID paying approximately 50% of project costs.

motions.title: Funding Authorization for Ashford Dunwoody Commuter Trail Phase I Construction
motions.description: Approval of funding authorization for construction of Ashford Dunwoody Commuter Trail Phase I.

motions.title: Lighting Agreement with Georgia Power for Ashford Dunwoody Path Phase 1
motions.description: Approval of lighting agreement with Georgia Power for Ashford Dunwoody Path Phase 1 streetlights.

motions.title: Facility Usage Agreements with Athletic Associations (Minus DSB)
motions.description: Approval of Facility Usage Agreements with athletic association partners but removing Dunwoody Senior Baseball agreement for separate consideration.

motions.title: Technology Policy Adoption
motions.description: Adoption of technology policy with revision to page 18, section 1B to apply to everyone.

motions.title: Second Round American Rescue Plan Grant Recipients Approval
motions.description: Approval of second round of qualified grant recipients for American Rescue Plan funding.

motions.title: Funding Authorization for 5252 Trowbridge Drive Storm Repairs
motions.description: Approval of funding authorization for 5252 Trowbridge Drive storm repairs in amount of $84,248.36 including 10% contingency.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for litigation discussion.

publicHearings.title: Text Amendment to Chapter 4 - Alcoholic Beverages (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to Chapter 4 Alcoholic Beverages to adjust alcohol licensing requirements including reduction from 60%/40% to 50%/50% food/alcohol split for eating establishments and creation of new groups for entertainment/spectator sports and personal improvement services.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer AbuBakarr Savage
specialEvents.description: Chief Grogan introduced and Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer AbuBakarr Savage.

presentations.title: Code Enforcement Introduction and Overview
presentations.description: Introduction and overview of code enforcement process and special projects by Shane Peeples, with explanation that code enforcement is complaint driven and officers assigned to three districts.

discussionItems.title: Capital Project Closeout and Reallocate Funding
discussionItems.description: Presentation of capital project closeouts and reallocation of funding.

notes: Council Member Lambert read extensive prepared comments into record addressing trails misinformation
Dunwoody Senior Baseball agreement removed for separate consideration pending field usage discussions
Council Member Heneghan absent during some votes
